panels.title: WEB HTTP Status Codes per second
API HTTP Status Codes per second
Git over HTTPS Status Codes per second

targets.expr: sum(instance_cpu:node_cpu_not_idle:rate5m{tier="stor", environment="$environment", type="gitaly"}) without (cpu) / instance:node_cpus:count{tier="stor", environment="$environment", type="gitaly"}
sum(sidekiq_running_jobs_count{tier="db", environment="$environment", type="redis", name!~"(ActiveJob|Devise).*"} and on (fqdn) gitlab:redis_master)
